[ros2cli.command]
trace = ros2trace.command.trace:TraceCommand

[ros2cli.extension_point]
ros2trace.verb = ros2trace.verb:VerbExtension

[ros2trace.verb]
pause = ros2trace.verb.pause:PauseVerb
resume = ros2trace.verb.resume:ResumeVerb
start = ros2trace.verb.start:StartVerb
stop = ros2trace.verb.stop:StopVerb
